stages.title: Design of the Experiment
stages.bullet_one: • The criteria and methodologies for selecting the participant sample were defined, ensuring a stratified approach to achieve representative results.
stages.bullet_two: • Established comparison frameworks to assess mother brands versus non-mother brands.
stages.bullet_three: •  Established the key metrics to be measured and formalized the procedures for collecting the necessary data.
stages.description: This foundational stage focused on establishing the methodological framework for the study.

stages.title: Building the Simulated Online Storefront
stages.bullet_one: • Design and Develop an interactive, web-based platform that mimics an actual online shopping experience.
stages.bullet_two: • The core deliverable was the creation of a realistic and functional online platform where the experiment could be conducted.
stages.description: This stage was dedicated to creating the experimental environment necessary to simulate the user experience.

stages.title: Pilot Testing
stages.bullet_one: • Conducted initial trials to assess the flow, clarity, and effectiveness of the defined experimental steps.
stages.bullet_two: • Documented and analyzed any unforeseen technical, procedural, or participant-related problems.
stages.bullet_three: • Made necessary adjustments based on pilot findings to ensure the final experiment was optimized and free of bias.
stages.description: Test experimental procedures. A critical stage for validating the experimental setup and protocols before full deployment

stages.title: Experiment Execution
stages.bullet_one: • Executed the study across defined segments or groups as per the finalized protocol.
stages.bullet_two: • Ensured all necessary data points were gathered accurately and efficiently using the predetermined collection methods.
stages.description: The primary data collection phase focused on the systematic implementation of the finalized design.

stages.title: Analyze
stages.bullet_one: • Applied appropriate statistical methods to the collected data to test hypotheses and formulate evidence-based conclusions.
stages.bullet_two: • Modeling of pick rates, segmentation thresholds, and sentiment themes.
stages.description: The final stage, where raw data was translated into actionable insights and presented.
